statement.p: Out of the last 47 days, it rained 6 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{6}}{{47}}={0.12765957446809}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.12765957446809}={12.765957446809} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 12.77 .
